device

Class BaseStation

  • java.lang.Object
    • device.MapObject
      • device.Device
        • device.DeviceWithWithoutRadio
          • device.DeviceWithRadio
            • device.SensorNode
              • device.StdSensorNode
                • device.BaseStation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class BaseStation
extends StdSensorNode
    BaseStation is used connect user and the network. User receives data from base station and sensors return data to base station.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ahcene Bounceur

        Constructor 6
        Parameters:
        x - Latitude
        y - Longitude
        radius - Radius of the sensor (default value = 0 meters)
        radioRadius - Radius (range) of the radio (in meter)
        cuRadius - Radius of the sensor unit (default value = 10 meters)
        gpsFileName - The path of the GPS file
        scriptFileName - The path of the script file
